name: download-artifacts
description: Download Artifacts task, can be used in release definitions, to filter and download, for given build artifact(s), by build artifact name, when multiple artifacts available in build.
author: Chaminda Chandrasekara

inputs.name: artifactNames
inputs.label: Build Artifact Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifact Names/Paths to Download separated by ;. Example asterisk (default) as artifat names allow all artifacts download. Multiple artifacts can be specified with pattern Drop1;Drop2. Artifact name with subpath allows to download sub item of a given artifact. Multiple can be specified with pattern Drop1\MyWebProj;Drop1\ReleaseNote.html;Drop2;Drop3\MyWebProj2 . Wild cards in paths are NOT SUPPORTED. Asterisk value as default supported to specify all artifacts.

inputs.name: artifactDestinationFolder
inputs.label: Artifacts Destination
inputs.helpMarkDown: Absolute path of the destination folder on the local machine, or a UNC Share like c:\fabrikamfiber or \\\\fabrikamshare\fabrikamfiber. If not supplied default value $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)\$(Build.DefinitionName) will be applied automatically
